title: Petition for rerolled skins to be permanents
body:
Here’s a very sad story
(liek if you cri every tiem) 
I reroll my 2 beekeeper singed shards and a sea hunter aatrox shard. As a mainly f2p player, rerolls are where I get my skins from, because getting around 12 key fragments and 4 hextech chests can take around 1-2 months. (Factoring in the champ, ward, and emote shards) Ok. So I press the reroll button. I get ryze whitebeard. My second ryze skin. And I hate playing ryze.

replies.body: what do u mean re-rolls already give u a skin permanent of a skin u dont have
You don't get the permanent shards, it auto redeems the skin.
kinda of the same thing cause if u have all skins and u re-roll u get a random permanent skin shard
Not many people have all the skins. What OP means is if you were given shards you could still get some Orange Essence for skins you don't want.

I get shards for skins I already own plenty of the time.
Either dust them into OE and buy the shard you like, or take a gamble.

I don't play Corki, but my last random reroll (of 3 shards) gave me a second Corki skin to never use. Dem's da breaks bro.
who gave me a downy votey
